title: Shemuel
html: SHEMUEL(She·muʹel) [Name of God].The same Hebrew name is also translated “Samuel.”1. Head of a forefather’s house; son or descendant of Issachar’s son Tola.—1Ch 7:1, 2.2. Simeon’s tribal representative to the delegation that divided the Promised Land into tribal allotments; son of Ammihud.—Nu 34:17, 18, 20.
